metadata.name: OG 000011
metadata.description:
Sophisticated storage for sublime strains.

We believe cannabis is glorious. The diligence that goes into cultivating your favorite strains should be celebrated. Whether you practice mindful medication or ritual recreation, our elevated humidorbs are designed to capture your cannabis and suspend it in all of its trichome glory. Each Digital Capsule NFT entitles the owner to take delivery of the corresponding IRL Capsule if it is still available. Only one IRL Capsule exists for each NFT, so please verify the Status Attribute of the NFT carefully to confirm if a Capsule has been Launched and Redeemed by a prior holder, or if it is in our Capsule Vault and available to transfer as part of future hybrid NFT sales.

Fine Print: Capsule Vault storage is limited to 1 year from the initial offering date. Legal compliance mandates our Capsules must ship empty for you to fill with your own favorite flower upon arrival.
metadata.Capsule Control: Contact CapsuleControl@StashCapsule.com to coordinate physical delivery.
